alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:35PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett, southwestern Mississippi, northern Crittenden, northeastern Cross and southwestern Tipton Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Parkin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Marked Tree, Earle, Parkin, Tyronza, Joiner, Crawfordsville, Sunset, Gilmore, Jericho, Turrell, Clarkedale, Birdsong, Three Forks, Payneway, Dimple, Booker, Deckerville, Menesha and Weona Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
